cookiePolicy.description: This page is prepared by CrunchyPix, the operator of the CrunchyPix website (hereinafter referred to as 'we', 'us', or 'our site'), to provide information about the use of cookies.

cookiePolicy.title: What are Cookies?
cookiePolicy.description: Cookies are small text files stored on your web browser. Websites can send or retrieve information from your browser through cookies. While these do not personally identify you, they are often used to enhance user experience.

cookiePolicy.title: Essential Cookies for Site Functionality
cookiePolicy.description: These cookies are necessary to provide the basic functions of the website and ensure its secure operation. Cookies in this category perform essential functions such as storing user language preferences and improving site performance.

cookiePolicy.title: Development and Measurement Cookies
cookiePolicy.description: Two cookies are used for statistical measurement for development purposes on our site: Vercel Speed Insights and Vercel Web Analytics.

subTitles.title: Vercel Speed Insights Cookie
subTitles.description: This cookie is used to measure the performance of our pages and enhance user experience. It does not identify any individual visitor or IP address. The collected information is anonymous and used only for general statistics.

subTitles.title: Vercel Web Analytics Cookie
subTitles.description: This cookie is used to understand website traffic and obtain general statistics. It does not collect personal information or include any identifying details about you. The collected data is anonymous and used for aggregate statistics.

cookiePolicy.title: Third-Party Resources
cookiePolicy.description: Third-party resources such as Google Fonts are used on our site. These resources are used to enhance the appearance and performance of our site. The use of these resources is subject to the privacy policy of the respective third party.

cookiePolicy.title: Controlling Cookies
cookiePolicy.description: You can control or delete cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may prevent certain features of websites from functioning properly.

cookiePolicy.title: More Information
cookiePolicy.description: For more information about our cookie policy, please visit our [Privacy Policy](/terms-of-privacy) and [GDPR](/gdpr) pages. Additionally, refer to Vercel's privacy notices for [Vercel Speed Insights](https://vercel.com/docs/speed-insights) and [Vercel Web Analytics](https://vercel.com/docs/analytics).

privacyPolicy.description: This page outlines the privacy policy of the CrunchyPix website, operated by CrunchyPix (hereinafter referred to as 'we', 'us', or 'our site').

privacyPolicy.title: Collected Information
privacyPolicy.description: Our website collects a limited amount of information to improve user experience and enhance service quality. This includes anonymous and general statistics provided by Vercel Analytics and Vercel Speed Insights. Additionally, browser cookies are used to store language preferences. Information provided to us through the contact form is also evaluated within this scope.

privacyPolicy.title: Scope of Collected Information
privacyPolicy.description: The collected information includes details about how users visit our website, the type of browser used, operating system, geographic location (country), and the referring site. This information is used to understand user interactions on our site and improve its performance. It does not include, collect, or store personal information such as IP addresses, advertising and promotion preferences, or search history.

privacyPolicy.title: Use of Cookies
privacyPolicy.description: Our site stores information by placing cookies on your browser. These cookies are used to perform essential functions such as language preferences and to enhance site performance. You can control or disable cookie usage through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may prevent certain features of the site from functioning properly.

privacyPolicy.title: Third-Party Services
privacyPolicy.description: Third-party resources like Google Fonts may be used on our site. These resources are integrated to improve the appearance and performance of our site. Privacy policies of these third-party services can be found on their respective websites.

privacyPolicy.title: Sharing of Personal Information
privacyPolicy.description: Personal information provided to us through the contact form is used solely for communication purposes and is never shared with third parties under any circumstances. This information is securely stored in accordance with legal requirements and our privacy policy. It is retained for a specific period and then deleted.

privacyPolicy.title: Contact Forms
privacyPolicy.description: Information provided to us through the contact form on our site is used to respond to user inquiries and fulfill requests. This information is stored for a specific period and then deleted.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy Changes
privacyPolicy.description: This privacy policy may be updated when necessary. Announcements will be made on our website to inform you of any changes. It is important to periodically check this page to stay informed about our current policies.

privacyPolicy.title: More Information
privacyPolicy.description: For more information about our privacy policy, or if you have questions or concerns, please contact us through our [Contact](/contact) page.

termsOfServices.title: 8. Service Cancellation and Termination
termsOfServices.description: If a client believes that a project should be canceled before commencement, they must notify CrunchyPix in writing. In the case of cancellations made by the client after the project has started, half of the total project fee that remains unpaid will be charged. Cancellation requests before project initiation must be made at least the specified period in advance.

In case of non-payment, CrunchyPix will provide the necessary notifications to the client and can exercise legal rights if the payment is not completed within a certain period. Payments for hourly rate agreements are collected at the end of each specified period based on reported hours.

termsOfServices.title: 10. Privacy Policy
termsOfServices.description: CrunchyPix values the privacy of users and provides more information on this matter in the Privacy Policy page. Users can become informed by reviewing our privacy policy [here](/terms-of-privacy).

termsOfServices.title: 11. Contact
termsOfServices.description: For more information or questions, please visit our [contact page](/contact).
In accordance with these terms of service, you can use CrunchyPix services and review shared content. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us.
